授業目的: This course examines the construction of images of gender and criteria of gendering in Japanese media. Leaning on gender and queer theory we will inquire into the cultural role of gender, and specifically examine gender construction in Japanese media. We will explore different representations of femininities and masculinities; inquire into the nature of agency and subjectivity. We will acquire understanding of basic gender studies methodology as well as learn about the specific examples from representation of gender in contemporary classic theater, to popular media such as manga and anime.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will gain an insight into gender studies methodology and gender-related media studies (within the context of Japanese media studies). Students will learn to apply this method of critical analysis within the context of Japanese media studies.
